cab.content: (PHIS DOCUMENT h. THE PROPERTY OFHIS BRIT an-TY'S GOVERNMENT.)Military Secret.1281^From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 3rd February 1920.CP. 5 7.0^i^HALLGN^ . (Received 4th.) 1433. Malleson telegraphs 30th January " Austrian Lieutenant, arriving as refugee on frontier 29th January, confirmsconstant coming and going of Turks between Azerbaijan and Turkestan ; propaganda-work of Turks in Tashkent, special (? schools) and Turkish scheme for attack onPersia. Constant drafts of Bolshevik troops from centre pass through Askabadtowards Krasnovodsk. There are now five or six aeroplanes in Askabad; alsoarmoured cars. There are still great fuel difficulties everywhere."
